snippet.title: SteamWorld Heist: The Outsider DLC Trailer (Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
Out now on 3DS!

Captain Piper stumbles upon a new ally with a past shrouded in mystery. Dive into the action and take on new missions with brand-new weapons, gear and a shipload of hats! 

Includes: A new playable character, new missions, new weapons and gear, and stylish new headwear.

The Outsider costs $4.99/€4.99/£4.49 or the equivalent, and is available as Add-On Content from within SteamWorld Heist. 

Available at the same time is the long-awaited language update, which adds five new languages: French, German, Italian, Spanish and Russian!

About SteamWorld Heist:

In SteamWorld Heist, you command a steam-driven pirate crew in a series of epic tactical shootouts. It’s turn-based strategy with a twist: You manually aim the guns of your crewmates, allowing for insane skill shots and bullet-bouncing action.

As the captain you will board, loot and shoot your way through enemy spaceships. Overcome the challenges of the vast frontier by upgrading your robots with unique abilities, weapons – and even stylish hats!

Official website: http://imageform.se/game/steamworld-heist
